course.title: MAT 4375 Multivariate Statistical Methods (3 units)
course.desc: Multivariate normal distribution: properties, estimation, testing. Topics chosen from multivariate regression, analysis of variance and covariance, linear discriminant analysis, component and factor analysis, canonical correlation. Analysis of data using statistical software packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 2141 or MAT 2342), (MAT 3375 or MAT 3378).
